870950.name: Drone Investigations
870950.description:
This is a Drone Investigation, we need you to locate evidence and other items to ensure we can convict the drug dealer(s) living there. You will be required to fly a police drone around the available areas looking for Drugs, Firearms and other evidence that can lead to a successful mission. With accurate drone controls and tilting FPV camera the right candidate will have a restricted flight time available to locate the required items, so a good pilot is a must!

Step Up, You're Next! Lets See What You've Got!
870950.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
